subject: Boston Marathon
lead_paragraph: Boston Marathon officials announced that for the first time in the race’s 112-year history, corporate advertisements would appear at the start and finish lines. The Boston Athletic Association, which organizes the race, also said that prize money for this year’s race would be $796,000, up from $575,000 last year.
